content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I am always happy to show my apartments to potential tenants. Regarding the rental price, I am looking for the highest possible price for this apartment. Please make an offer, and we can take it from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, considering the average rental price for similar apartments in München, I would say 700 euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is a low price for such a centrally located, newly built apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 750 euros per month? It's a fair price considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 750 euros per month is still not high enough for this apartment. I am looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this property. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. In that case, I propose 800 euros per month as a more reasonable price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 800 euros per month is closer to my expectations, but I believe this apartment deserves a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I can offer 850 euros per month for this apartment. It's a great apartment, but I think this price is fair for all the amenities it offers.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 850 euros per month is a good price, but I believe this apartment is worth more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Max, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe my offer of 850 euros per month is reasonable considering the location, size, and condition of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Max. However, I do not want to continue the negotiation either, because I believe the apartment is worth more than your offer of 850 euros per month. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
